Text:
OiKatzo and Delta gather food in preparation for
their confrontation with Wethermon. However...
Hey, Delta! You're running off too far ahead!
But I smell prey over here!
I get that, but don't just leave me behind...

Since we're here together, we might as well engage
in some efficient co-op play.

Play...? I don't really get it... If you wanna hunt
together, you better keep up with me!

That's not really co-op... Besides, would you say
the same thing to Alpha?
Lady Alpha is strong, so there's no need to say anything.

You mean you only follow the strong. Wait, then what
about me—
You're weaker than me!

Y-You...! Fine, care to explain how I'm inferior to
you, Delta?
You're worse at hunting! That's why you're weaker!

Hahah... Thanks for the straightforward explanation.
It's been a while since someone called me weak...
Heheh! Thank me for it!
Not happening!

Okay, Delta. So, being good at hunting means you're
strong, right?
Of course.

In that case, let's compete to see who can catch
more prey.

If I win...that'll prove I'm stronger than you,
right?
Hmph! Impossible! I'm stronger than you!
Fine, then show me—time to find out who's stronger.
It's game on!
Grrarrrr!

What's with the crazy response time?! Your reflexes
are off the chart...
What's the matter? Too scared to move?
Yeah, keep talking! I have my way of doing things!

...When she makes sudden turns, she uses her tail
for balance, slowing down her movements slightly...

She tends to pause after stepping left or right...
Got it. I've pretty much got her movement patterns
down.
...What are you mumbling about?

Well, doesn't matter! You can't beat me! This prey
is mine—
Too bad. That one's mine.
When did you—?! Hmph, in that case—
Sorry, I'm taking this one too!
Stop taking all my prey! That's cheating!

I'm a pro gamer. Reading my opponent's moves is just
part of the game.

That said, I don't have your nose or eyes for
finding prey, so swiping your finds is just more
efficient.
Pro...gamer?
Um... Think of it as a pack that's good at fighting.
Grr... Not bad, but I'm stronger!

Oh, is that so? In that case, I'll show you what it
looks like when a pro gamer starts sweating!

...So, you got caught up competing and forgot it was
time to regroup, huh?
Haha. Katzo's getting scolded!

Hey now, Sunraku. Don't put it like that, or you'll
make Katzo feel bad...heheh.
Well, it was Delta who started it!

What!? You were hunting with me!
It's your fault too!
...Delta?
Eep!

It seems Delta has been causing problems.
I apologize on her behalf.

Well...I sort of played into it as well, so don't
worry about it.
But, Katzo, you're to blame too.
Wh-What the heck?

You got baited so easily and let it cloud your
judgment. Are you sure it's okay for a pro
gamer to be so susceptible to taunting?
Ack... Can't really argue with that...!

Maybe you should cultivate a more tolerant state of
mind through trash games, like me.

You're not tolerant, either! You guys are getting on
my nerves more than Delta!

Even after continuous teasing by the two of them,
OiKatzo can't come up with a good comeback—
